visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Custom colors should be used for the series, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.

subtitle.text: Drag and click to view events

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents months, and the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series, named 'Temperature', includes monthly average temperature data for a year. Custom colors are applied to the series, and additional configurations include chart margins, background color, and legend settings to enhance readability and visual appeal.
